notes.title: Data Availability
notes.p: The data have been obtained from Thomson Reutersâ€™ Web of Science database. Readers can contact Thomson Reuters to obtain the data ( http://thomsonreuters.com/thomson-reuters-web-of-science/). Readers that do not have access to the Web of Science database can contact Thomson Reuters to obtain a license. Relevant information can be found at http://thomsonreuters.com/en/products-services/scholarlyscientific-reaserch/scholarly-search-and-discovery/web-of-science.html.
